title: Are The New Assassin's Creed Ragnarok Leaks Legit? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.13.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

If you go to http://getquip.com/games right now, you’ll get your first refill free!

Get started with your first month of Hims free by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

Blessing and Tim discuss a potential huge leak for an upcoming Assassin's Creed game.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:35 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:04:01 - Assassin’s Creed Ragnarok is leaking all over the place!
00:13:35 - “Do you see Playstation repeating history with another February reveal event, like they did 7 years ago for the PS4?” - The Nano Biologist
00:18:00 - Call of Duty and GTA V dominated PlayStation Store downloads in 2019
00:23:10 - Monster Hunter World: Iceborne PC is deleting save files for some players
00:28:09 - Awesome Games Done Quick 2020 Raises More Money For Charity Than Ever Before
00:28:46 - “Do you watch speed running in your limited down time?” - Frank Furtter
00:39:02 - GTA 4 is No Longer Available To Buy On Steam
00:42:02 - Out today
00:45:27 - Upstart
00:46:50 - HIMS
00:48:58 - Quip  
 Reader mail   -
00:50:27 - “Over the weekend was Pokémon’s Producer, Director, and Composer Junichi Masuda’s birthday…” - 2038 Pokemon CEO
00:55:18 - “Is there a chance the new systems will come with a subscription/contract way to pay like att or Verizon?” - Marco Antonio Morales de la cruz
00:57:33 - Squad Up: Tyrone - PSN - TragicJohnson
00:58:37 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Imran
01:02:31 - Post Show

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
